name: Chakra: Challenger Club
overview: Chakra consists of four mini-games: Chakra de Chuck Norris: a timed quiz. The player can choose a theme (anime, magazines, or manga), and answer a series of questions correctly within a time limit. Doki-Doki Counseling: a short visual novel with the following plot: the hero begins his work as a counselor at a girls school. Needless to say that the goal is to choose the correct replies in order to... err... perform a very specific "therapy" on the girls. Flag Flapper: a memory game, which requires fast reaction to follow and identify rapidly changing flags. Puzzles 60: a simple sliding puzzle game.
